title: 'Tiger King': John Finlay wants Shia LaBeouf or Channing Tatum to play him in a movie
title_page: 'Tiger King': John Finlay wants Shia LaBeouf or Channing Tatum to play him in a movie  - CNN
maintext:
(CNN) Joe Exotic's ex-husband, John Finlay, has his sights set on two of Hollywood's biggest stars should Netflix's "Tiger King" be turned into a feature film.
"Either Shia LaBeouf or Channing Tatum," Finlay told CNN in an interview on Friday.
When told that his ex-husband reportedly hoped Brad Pitt would play him, he laughed and said, "Brad Pitt, no. Dax Shephard, he would probably be the better choice."
Finlay, who is remarried, with a whole new set of teeth, said he was disappointed that the docuseries made him look like a "drugged-out hillbilly."
"Overall, it was good but there were quite a few parts I didn't agree with," Finlay said. "They should have done follow-through stories at the end. They made me look like a drugged-out hillbilly. They didn't even show my new teeth or the actual tattoo finished. There was quite a bit they didn't even touch on."
